data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
The first-half is now underway.
Enschede's Noa Lang gets in a shot on goal at Grolsch Veste Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Filip Bednarek for Heerenveen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Enschede.
Corner awarded to Heerenveen.
In Enschede, Rodney Kongolo (Heerenveen) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Heerenveen have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Heerenveen drives forward and Alen Halilovic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Hicham Faik is on target to give Heerenveen a 0-1 advantage.
Free kick for Heerenveen in their own half.
[47] gets his shot on target but fails to score for [48].
In Enschede a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Enschede have a goal kick.
Heerenveen drive upfield and Joey Veerman gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Enschede defender.
Corner awarded to Heerenveen.
Heerenveen pushes forward through [47], whose finish on goal is saved.
[47] of [48] smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Goal kick for Heerenveen at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Attention is being given to Enschede’s Giorgi Aburjania and play has been suspended briefly.
Giorgi Aburjania for Enschede is back on the field again.
Joey Kooij signals a free kick to Heerenveen.
Joey Kooij awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Enschede in the half of Heerenveen.
Heerenveen needs to be cautious. Enschede have an attacking throw-in.
Can Enschede get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Heerenveen's half?
Free kick in a good position for Enschede!
Joey Kooij awards Heerenveen a goal kick.
Joey Kooij signals a throw-in for Enschede, close to Heerenveen's area.
Enschede to take a throw-in in Heerenveen territory.
Calvin Verdonk for Enschede drives towards goal at Grolsch Veste Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Enschede have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Calvin Verdonk (Enschede) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Ball safe as Heerenveen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Enschede in their own half.
Joey Kooij signals a Enschede throw-in in Heerenveen's half.
Enschede have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Ball goes out of play for a Heerenveen goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Heerenveen goal kick.
In Enschede Heerenveen attack through Joey Veerman. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Enschede.
Enschede's Calvin Verdonk misses with an attempt on goal.
Heerenveen have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Heerenveen.
Enschede awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Enschede, Alen Halilovic of Heerenveen is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Heerenveen have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Heerenveen push forward at Grolsch Veste Stadium and Ibrahim Dresevic gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Enschede defence.
Corner awarded to Heerenveen.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Enschede Heerenveen drive forward through Joey Veerman. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Heerenveen.
In Enschede, Heerenveen push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Can Enschede get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Heerenveen's half?
Throw-in Heerenveen.
Hicham Faik (Heerenveen) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Heerenveen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Enschede have a dangerous throw-in.
Joey Kooij signals a Enschede throw-in in Heerenveen's half.
Free kick Enschede.
Enschede's Lindon Selahi breaks free at Grolsch Veste Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Joey Kooij awards Heerenveen a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Can Enschede capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Heerenveen's half?
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
It's now 0-2 in Enschede as Chidera Ejuke scores for Heerenveen.
Alen Halilovic with an assist there.
Enschede are pushing forward but Noa Lang's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Heerenveen at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Enschede have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Enschede's Peet Bijen attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Heerenveen goal kick.
Heerenveen's Alen Halilovic gets in a shot on goal at Grolsch Veste Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Joey Kooij signals a free kick to Enschede in their own half.
Queensy Menig (Enschede) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Enschede.
Enschede have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Heerenveen's Chidera Ejuke is on target but unsuccessful.
Joey Veerman puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
That's a fine assist from Chidera Ejuke.
Free kick for Enschede in the half of Heerenveen.
Heerenveen have a goal kick.
Heerenveen surge into the attack at Grolsch Veste Stadium but Joey Veerman’s header is off-target.
Joey Kooij awards Enschede a goal kick.
Enschede awarded a free kick in their own half.
Mitchell Van Bergen (Heerenveen) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Heerenveen have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Heerenveen's Ricardo Van Rhijn gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Enschede.
In Enschede a free kick has been awarded the home team.
An attacking Enschede player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Heerenveen's Filip Bednarek has been booked in Enschede.
Throw-in Enschede.
Goal! Enschede now trail just 1-3 thanks to a penalty from Haris Vuckic.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Giorgi Aburjania.
Enschede make their first substitution with Rafik Zekhnini replacing Oriol Busquets.
Enschede's Giorgi Aburjania looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Joey Kooij signals a free kick to Heerenveen in their own half.
Joey Kooij awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Enschede.
Giorgi Aburjania of Enschede gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Heerenveen at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Ball safe as Enschede is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal! Lindon Selahi pulls one back to make it 2-3.
Great play from Queensy Menig to set up the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Enschede.
Throw-in for Enschede in their own half.
Johnny Jansen (Heerenveen) is making a first substitution, with Hamdi Akujobi replacing Joey Veerman.
Throw-in for Heerenveen at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Enschede have been awarded a corner by Joey Kooij.
Throw-in high up the field for Enschede in Enschede.
Ball goes out of play for a Heerenveen goal kick.
Jens Odgaard is replacing Alen Halilovic for Heerenveen at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Enschede awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Free kick for Heerenveen in their own half.
Heerenveen are caught offside.
Ball safe as Enschede is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Heerenveen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joey Kooij awards Heerenveen a goal kick.
Free kick for Enschede in their own half.
Calvin Verdonk for Enschede drives towards goal at Grolsch Veste Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Enschede.
Heerenveen have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Enschede close to the penalty box.
Daniel Hoegh is on a sub for Chidera Ejuke for Heerenveen.
Goal kick for Heerenveen at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Joey Kooij signals a free kick to Enschede in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Heerenveen in their own half.
Can Heerenveen capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Enschede's half?
Enschede awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Heerenveen.
Heerenveen are coming forward and Ibrahim Dresevic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Enschede have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Enschede. The final score is 2-3.
